text: Sandro Sambugaro (born 6 July 1965) is an Italian ski jumper. He competed at the 1984 Winter Olympics and the 1988 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:People from Asiago
title: Sandro Sambugaro
